extendedInfo.description: Feature:Can you imagine what will happen when the kitty and apples play together? Q Kitty Garden combines kitty raising and garden management. Try and have fun from raising your kitty and collecting apples  of every variety .Game mode:1. Farm mode: You can raise a cute kitty and play with it.2. Garden mode: You can get different kinds of apples from the tree and earn some money to raise your kitty.Language: English. Chinese

reviews.title: its a  cute game in the whole world
reviews.comment: I love the Kitty its cuter if it had more Kitty\'s like um.....6225 wow good cute GE:-)
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Bored
reviews.comment: Would give 5 if i could take of kitty like a tamagotchi but with theses graphics i got to the end basically there\'s nothing to do not much to do with kitty no point in apples now....
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Cute!
reviews.comment: I don\'t understand why this game has so many negative reviews. This is a cute game and fun! I wish the kitty\'s mouth and eyes didn\'t look so mad. And if you could change the fur. I still love picking the apples!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Not bad, not too shabby.
reviews.comment: I\'ve seen a lot of better graphics, but it wasn\'t that horrible. And the gameplay was a little basic, but like a lot of people said, it\'s cute. If they made the game a little more complicated, like raising more than one kitty or different kinds of food and I don\'t know, have a little more variety in actions it\'d be more fun.
reviews.author: Angel Marazz

reviews.title: Cute but confusing.
reviews.comment: Giving it 2 stars because the cat is kind of cute. Been playing for a wee while now and have no idea what am doing. I get the idea, but everythings a little vague. Cat got sick within 10 mins and it costs real money to cure it. I think. Uninstalled: too confusing, too odd and not entertaining enough.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Well...
reviews.comment: It would be awesome if we could pick different types of cats and maybe even buy another different cat and have kittens, but not just that but be able to do more to. And at first I was scared of my cat because it looked so mad. Plus I always think it is mad at me when I pet it. But other than that its a prrrrretty nice game! Thanks for uploading it! ;D
reviews.author: A Google User
